Name: Love me flip
Ingredients: 60 ml Caribbean blended rum aged 6-10 years
15 ml Lustau San Emilio Pedro Ximénez Sherry
7.5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
Instructions: BEAT egg yolk with sugar in base of shaker. Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.
Review: The grated tonka bean adds a vanilla aroma to the surface of this drink.
History: Created in 2010 by Erik Lorincz at The Connaught Hotel, London, England.
